import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; function Checkout() { const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const [checkoutInput, setCheckoutInput] = useState([]); var total = 0; const navigate = useNavigate(); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); if (!localStorage.getItem('auth_token')) { navigate('/categories'); swal('Molimo Vas da se prijavite kako biste pristupili svojoj košarici.', 'poruka', 'error'); } useEffect(() => { document.title = 'Moja tržnica'; axios.get(`/api/my-shopping-cart/`).then(res => { if (res.data.status === 200) { setCart(res.data.list); setLoading(false); } else if (res.data.status === 401) { swal('Molimo Vas da se prijavite kako biste pristupili svojoj košarici', res.data.message, 'error'); navigate('/categories'); } }); setLoading(false); }, []); if (loading) { return
